snippet: Much of what applies to those who have been fired once would be true for those facing the situation a second or third time.
abstract: Alina Tugend Shortcuts column on individuals who have been laid off from their jobs more than once, and how they can pick up and find alternatives to turn around a bad situation; emotional and financial toll of multiple job losses can weigh heavily on those uncertain about how to proceed with their careers.
lead_paragraph: Much of what applies to those who have been fired once would be true for those facing the situation a second or third time.
